name: Heat Waves
description:
Heat Waves Created by DaveH355 and Jackkillian

Protect the local floating city from the heat waves! Flush out any bad guys and prevent them from causing chaos. Don't hurt the innocent folks.

Controls

WAD - Move around

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Use item

Don't forget, you can wall jump!

Gameplay Tips

- You have only 1 item slot. Be careful what you pick up

- The grappling hooks are exceedingly risky to use. They serve only to annoy.

- Stay near cover. Attackers come from all directions

- You also have only 1 life during the Heat Blaze event

Assets

We made all of our own assets except for the font, which you can view here: https://github.com/powerline/fonts
